Convert OD data into geographic 'desire line' objects

Source: R/od-funs.R
od_to_sf.Rd

Convert OD data into geographic 'desire line' objects

od_to_sf(x, z, zd = NULL, verbose = FALSE, package = "sfheaders", crs = 4326)

od_to_sfc(x, z, zd = NULL, verbose = FALSE, package = "sfheaders", crs = 4326)

Arguments

x

A data frame in which the first two columns are codes representing points/zones of origin and destination
z

Zones representing origins and destinations
zd

Zones representing destinations
verbose

Print messages providing progress updates? FALSE by default
package

Which package to use to create the sf object? sfheaders is the default.
crs

The coordinate reference system of the output, if not known in z. 4326 by default.

Examples

x = od_data_df
z = od_data_zones
desire_lines = od_to_sfc(x, z)
desire_lines[1:3]
#> Geometry set for 3 features 
#> geometry type:  LINESTRING
#> dimension:      XY
#> bbox:           xmin: -1.582003 ymin: 53.79587 xmax: -1.534793 ymax: 53.82864
#> CRS:            EPSG:4326
#> LINESTRING (-1.534793 53.82864, -1.546024 53.79...
#> LINESTRING (-1.581617 53.81838, -1.546024 53.79...
#> LINESTRING (-1.582003 53.80796, -1.546024 53.79...
